content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Feb 2019Should I take full HDB loan for BTO or pay some in cash?Im not sure if it makes much difference. Full HDB loan: 260,000cash: 50,000Was thinking if I should use the cash for investment instead1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 Feb 2019If you are confident in getting higher returns with cash than CPF, you can consider. CPF is a pretty safe investment with decent returns but you cant withdraw prematurely. And you have to think about the negative part where you might lose all the cash if you failed. 0 comments1
